title: Chapter 2E - Guide Signs - Freeways And Expressways
content:
Chapter 2E - Guide Signs - Freeways And Expressways

State Regulations
§ 2E.14 - Size and Style of Letters and Signs
§ 2E.18 - Symbols
§ 2E.31 - Interchange Exit Numbering
§ 2E.39 - Post-Interchange Distance Signs
§ 2E.40 - Interchange Sequence Signs
§ 2E.41 - Community Interchanges Identification Signs
§ 2E.42 - NEXT XX EXITS Sign

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
